author: Elaine Lies
title: On brink of coronavirus crisis, Japan PM offers masks, gets social media roasting
description: Facing calls to declare a coronavirus state of emergency, Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe was flamed on social media on Thursday for instead offering people free cloth masks, pointing to growing frustration for some over his handling of the crisis.
